title: Software Engineering Team Lead (Backend)
job_description:
We are Kaizen Gaming. Kaizen Gaming is the leading GameTech company in Greece and one of the fastest-growing in Europe, with the Stoiximan brand in Greece and Cyprus and Betano in Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Portugal, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Canada. Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.

As a Software Engineering Team Lead, you will play a crucial role in leading and guiding a team of software engineers in the development and delivery of high-quality software products. You will be responsible for overseeing project execution, mentoring team members, and ensuring that engineering best practices are followed.

Tech Stack: .NET Core, C#, Microservices, REST API, RabbitMQ, MS SQL Server, OpenShift

Responsibilities:
- Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and inspire a team of software engineers
- Project Management: Manage project timelines, priorities, and resources
- Technical Guidance: Provide technical guidance, expertise, and code reviews
- Architecture and Design: Contribute to architectural decisions considering scalability, performance, and maintainability
- Process Improvement: Continuously evaluate and improve development processes
- Code Quality: Ensure code quality, maintainability, and documentation

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a software engineer with a strong track record
- Strong technical expertise in .NET or equivalent, Microservices and Sync and Async communication
- Leadership and project management experience
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies
- Knowledge of software design patterns, architecture, and system scalability
pain_points: Need strong technical leadership for backend engineering team
Ensuring engineering best practices are followed across the team
Managing project timelines and resource allocation effectively
Maintaining code quality and documentation standards
Scalability challenges with growing microservices architecture
strategic_needs: Scale engineering team while maintaining quality
Improve development processes and team velocity
risks_if_unfilled: Technical debt accumulation without leadership oversight
Team velocity decrease without proper mentorship
Architecture decisions made without proper guidance
success_metrics: Zero critical production incidents from code quality issues
